Dammit, I thought this would be Firefly-serenity
Umm... I kind of have a plane called the K-10 already, so would mind renaming the plane as the "KD-10"? Thanks, you don't have to rename it but it would be nice if you did.
It's beautifully simplistic in its design. Will DL.
been waiting on a serenity for a while guess the parts just not quite there yet lol

@Giggleplex777

Doing that right now!

Oh, thanks, but you could keep the name I'll just rename mine into the XK-10.
